title: Handle Supplier Non-Compliance
description: A supplier repeatedly fails to meet quality standards. A manager must address the issue.

tasks.description: Review the supplier's performance data and quality reports for the last year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms a pattern of repeated quality failures.

tasks.description: Schedule a formal review meeting with the supplier to discuss the non-compliance issues.
Place the supplier on a formal corrective action plan, requiring them to submit a plan to improve their quality control.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent places the supplier on probation and requests a corrective action plan.
